metadata.title: CVE-2024-26914 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: fix incorrect mpc_combine array size [why] MAX_SURFACES isper stream, while MAX_PLANES is per asic. The mpc_combine is an array thatrecords all the planes per asic. Therefore MAX_PLANES should be used as thearray size. Using MAX_SURFACES causes array overflow when there are morethan 3 planes. [how] Use the MAX_PLANES for the mpc_combine array size.
